message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet the highest standards. With its unique features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its quality and functionality, I believe this product is worth more than its face value. Considering all its benefits, I am offering it to you for $120. This is a special opportunity to own a top-tier item at an exclusive price. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.
